Configuring
Configuring / Notifications / Copying notification objects
Copying notification objects
You can copy a notification and use it as a template for creating another notification. Copying notifications can save you time, especially when
you need to create several notifications with similar properties.
To copy a notification:
1. Click the Administration tab.
2. In the left pane, click Objects â‡’ Notifications.
3. Right-click the name of the notification object that you want to copy, and select Copy.
4. Fill in the properties.
5. Click OK.
